about_the_game:
Gnome or Dwarf ? Either way you're a GWARF ! Collaborate and betray your friends in this social deduction game. Mine, collect ores and vote the traitors out. Also watch out for the saboteur who will try to ruin the expedition !



No matter where you come from, you are still a miner. Collaborate with the other gwarfs to mine and stock ores in the associated mine carts. You will have to be efficient as time is limited, form small groups and use your tools accordingly to drown in gold ! You can also forge alliances with your peers to keep ores for yourselves and win additional rewards ! At the risk of losing it all...



As a saboteur, your goal is to make the daily expedition a failure. Stash ores or steal them from other miners in order to buy secret powers at the black market ! Be careful though, if you don't pay attention enough, you risk to reveal yourself to others and end in prison !

FEATURES


Proximity voice chat
Gwarf comes with a proximity voice that allows you and your friends to plot in total discretion. Random events or anomalies, like the helium leak, can also affect your in game voice.

Proceduraly generated map
Each game of Gwarf feels like a brand new one. For each round, the mines are procedurally generated, the roles are redistributed and random events and anomalies are scattered around the map.

Gwarf Customization
Impress your friends with the accessories you found during your multiple expeditions. We give you a lot of options to play with the gwarf you want !

Accessibility
Gwarf is meant to be played by everyone. Thus, Fun For All is working hard to make the game accessible to most.

A ton of fun, especially with friends
Gwarf is more fun played with a lot of friends. Though, we give you the opportunity to join public lobbies to play with players around the globe !
